title: Executive Order 5992-Authorizing the Appointment of Charles Carran
content: Charles Carran may be appointed to a position as rural letter carrier in the classified service without compliance with the civil-service rules.
citation: Herbert Hoover, Executive Order 5992-Authorizing the Appointment of Charles Carran Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/361546
